descriptions.title: Premium Design
descriptions.description: The PUCO M3 features a textured back panel and a premium leather-like finish to offer an elegant look to this smartphone. Also, it has a side-mounted fingerprint sensor that adds a premium style and convenience.

descriptions.title: Battery Life
descriptions.description: The PUCO M3 comes with a massive battery that offers up to 672 hours of standby time. Also, the 18 W fast charging feature quickly boosts the battery life of this smartphone to ensure that your phone is always up and running.
